column4: Hey guys, Im new to ubuntu and have been using windows. I was wondering if I could get some help. When ever I boot my cd (latest version) I select start/install and it goes throught a loading proccess, then my monitor pops a box that moves accross my screen talking about resolutions, can anyone help?
it is the colour setting for your monitor
I dont think so, it just rotates around ,and I cant even get to the monitor menu
